page.title: 13SPORTS CENTRE, REDHILL
page.content: Donyngs{Recreation Centre}opened in December, l984. It has 3 floors & is built of bricks with a red metal exterior framework. Close to Redhill town centre,it can be reached on foot, by bus or car.A car-park is alongside. You can{swim}in a large or learner pool,& play indoor hockey, basketball, 5-a-side football, badminton or table tennis in the small & large{sports {halls.}There is also a weight training centre,health suite & 8 squash courts. There are{clubs}like the Tiger Club for under 5's & Marlin's where you learn swimming strokes. In a{survey carried out at Wray Common Middle School on 9-7-85, we found l0% of the school had never been to Donyngs, 34% went occasionally & 56% were regular users. Members are admitted free as spectators, otherwise adults pay 20p, children l0p.
